mapper.select: SELECT s.code , s.name , sv.view , sp1.price as now_price, sp2.price as init_price FROM stock AS s JOIN stock_views AS sv ON s.code = sv.stock_code JOIN ( SELECT stock_code , price FROM stock_price WHERE (stock_code , create_time) IN( SELECT stock_code , MAX(create_time) FROM stock_price GROUP BY stock_code )) as sp1 ON s.code = sp1.stock_code JOIN ( SELECT stock_code , price FROM stock_price WHERE (stock_code , create_time) IN( SELECT stock_code , MIN(create_time) FROM stock_price WHERE create_time > '20230513' GROUP BY stock_code )) as sp2 ON s.code = sp2.stock_code ORDER BY sv.view DESC LIMIT 20 OFFSET 0;
